resources.string: Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
Call to Vehicle API has returned a null :
"API reporting a failure response : Check the API is running"
Device not connected to internet. Cannot read current vehicle data
API reporting an unsuccessful response. status=
Vehicle data is not formatted correctly. Too many data items.
